channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.description:
Report X-2023070970

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was unloaded and leaked . put it in a tote to contain the spill. DescribePack: package leaked at top of product 2 lbs came out DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: put in atote

item.title: Report X-2023070966
item.description:
Report X-2023070966

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-11
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LOW TEMP DISH SANITIZER HAD VENTED CAPS AND WERE NOT IN PLASTIC BAGS ALLOWING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK. DescribePack: VENTED CAP LEAK WAS ABOUT THE SIZE OF A STANDARD ONE GALLON MILK JUG CAP. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN PLASTIC TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA IMMEDIATELY.

item.title: Report X-2023070930
item.description:
Report X-2023070930

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-11
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, and brought to QA. DescribePack: The cap on one jug was loose and leaking. Jug was about half empty. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed right side up in a spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report X-2023070877
item.description:
Report X-2023070877

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-08T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-08
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found package in damages area in a black Hazmat bin. DescribePack: Bottles inside of package were loaded upside down. Inner seal under cap of inner packages failed, causing leakage. No inner packing was found. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in Hazmat bin with absorbent pads. All bottles turned right side up.

THE PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A HAZ TOTE AND TAKEN TO QA DescribePack: ONE OF THE PAINT CANS HAD A LOOSE LID ALL LIQUID THAT LEAKED OUT WAS ABSORBED BY THE BOX DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A HAZ TOTE AND TAKEN TO QA

  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was brought to Quality Assurance wet and leaking in a hazmat bag and bin after being found. DescribePack: 2 Aerosol cans had their lids off and had lost all inner contents DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: package was placed into a hazmat bag and spill bin upon discovery.
